Text: Heya, Kitten! I've got a \n new job for you.
I need you to \n become Hekseville's \n number-one star!
This is your chance to \n be the one, the only, \n "Poterie Doll"!
She has fans everywhere! \n Which is good news.
But it's also bad news - \n we have trouble getting \n her from place to place.
So I need you \n to become her...
And draw, draw, draw her \n fans' attention away.
You mean you want me \n to be a stand-in...
You make it sound so \n second-class.

But don't worry, you'll 
 be making first-class 
 connections with this 
 job!
Well, I guess \n that makes sense.
Here's a radio we can \n use to stay in touch.
Okay, get changed and \n ready to roll!
Okay, get changed and \n ready to roll!
Manager: \n Make a U-turn and use the side street.
Manager: \n Up the stairs on the left.
Schoolboy: \n Poterie's rumoured to be coming this way!
Schoolgirl: \n Really! I sooo want to meet her!
Reach Your Goal Without \n Getting Caught by Fans
Thanks to you we safely \n got Poterie Doll where \n she needed to go.
I'm exhausted. \n Her fans have way \n too much energy.
So, did all my hard work \n land me a part?

Don't you worry, 
 there'll be a big role 
 for you just around the 
 corner.
I better get in shape \n if I'm going to run from \n fans like Poterie's...
Fan: \n Hey, where's the real Poterie?
Fan: \n Poterie, can I shake your hand?
Fan: \n Nice try! Where's the real Poterie?
Fan: \n I'm a big fan of your work, Poterie!
Fan: \n Poterie, can I take your picture?
Fan: \n Who are you? Where's Poterie?
Fan: \n Hey, everyone, she's a fake!
Fan: \n Mind giving me a shake?
Fan: \n I saw you on the big monitors!
Fan: \n You're not Poterie! You tryin' to pull something on me?
Fan: \n Shoulda known you weren't the real Poterie.
Fan: \n You're not Poterie at all!
Fan: \n Poterie, can I get a picture!?
Fan: \n Who do you think you are, pretending to be Poterie!
Fan: \n Could I get your autograph for my grandchildren?
Fan: \n The real Poterie's pretty. Who are you?
